basics.name: INDUSTRIAL ENGINEERING INTERN
basics.label: Industrial Engineer
basics.summary: Outstanding productivity as high potential project supervisor and design engineer. Hands-on experience in data analysis, discrete event simulations, manufacturing processes, process improvement, machine shop practices, welding and fabrication, and quality control.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Re-developed existing company labor system application and performed on-site data collection. Assisted in creating customized model, animations, and discrete event simulations and analysis for Airline project.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Redesigned equipment layout and process flow that reduced cycle time 13%. Assisted in capital budgeting/return on investment (ROI) analysis and trained and guided technicians in lean and continuous process improvement methodologies.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Revamped workstation layout and implemented ergonomic philosophy in equipment placing. Conducted research and developed new/existing manufacturing equipment, processes and methods. Implemented process control plans and assisted with design of manufacturing tools and fixtures. Designed, implemented and documented standard work instructions and standard operating procedures. Supported company initiatives.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed inspections, checks, tests, and sampling procedures of incoming materials. Conducted and documented process, environmental and quality control system audits.
